refnamediv.refpurpose: Returns excerpts with hit words from text

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This function produces representative samples for use in displaying a query hit. There are two modes: html mode and text mode. In html mode everything looks like html tags is ignored and searching of excerpt begins from <body> tag. All found hit words highlighted by html_hit_tag.
In text mode text is treated as plain text, html tag detection is disabled and hit words is not highlighted.

refsect2.title: hit_words
refsect2.para: array of hit words to be found in text. Number of hit words can not be more than 10.

refsect2.title: text
refsect2.para: original text where hit words are searched

refsect2.title: within_first
refsect2.para: number of chars in text from the start to consider. Default value is 20000.

refsect2.title: max_excerpt
refsect2.para: maximum length of single excerpt phrase. Default value is 90.

refsect2.title: total
refsect2.para: maximum length of whole excerpt. Default value is 200.

refsect2.title: html_hit_tag
refsect2.para: HTML tag which is used to highlight hit words in excerpt. Default value is "b". If it is NULL text mode is used

example.title: Creating search excerpt
example.para: creates a search excerpt from found DAV resource
